item.title: 【SRE Weekly Issue #488】SRE周刊＃488
item.description: 【View on sreweekly.com A message from our sponsor, Observe, Inc.: Observe‘s free Masterclass in Observability at Scale is coming on September 4th at 10am Pacific! We’ll explore how to architect for observability at scale – from streaming telemetry and open data lakes to AI agents that proactively instrument your code and surface insights. Learn more […]】在Sreweekly.com上查看我们的赞助商，Observe，Inc.。的消息：观察免费的大师班的观察性大规模可观察到了太平洋的9月4日上午10点！我们将探讨如何在大规模构建可观察性 - 从遥测和开放数据湖到主动地启用您的代码和表面见解的AI代理。了解更多 […]

item.title: 【SRE Weekly Issue #486】SRE周刊＃486
item.description: 【View on sreweekly.com A message from our sponsor, Spacelift: IaC Experts! IaCConf Call for Presenters – August 27, 2025 The upcoming IaCConf Spotlight dives into the security and governance challenges of managing infrastructure as code at scale. From embedding security in your pipelines to navigating the realities of open source risk, this event brings together […]】在Sreweekly.com上查看我们的赞助商Spacelift：IAC专家的消息！ IACCONF呼吁主持人 - 2025年8月27日，即将到来的IACCONF聚光灯潜入安全和治理挑战的挑战，即将基础架构作为大规模代码。从嵌入管道中的安全性到导航开源风险的现实，此事件将汇集在一起[…]

item.title: 【SRE Weekly Issue #485】SRE周刊＃485
item.description: 【View on sreweekly.com YOUR AD COULD BE HERE! SRE Weekly has openings for new sponsorships. Reply or email lex at sreweekly.com for details. Migrating the Jira Database Platform to AWS Aurora How would you migrate several million databases, with minimal impact to your users? Atlassian allocates one Postgres database per tenant customer, with a few […]】在sweekly.com上查看您的广告可能在这里！ SRE Weekly为新赞助提供了空缺。有关详细信息，请在sreweekly.com上回复或发送电子邮件。将JIRA数据库平台迁移到AWS Aurora，您将如何迁移数百万个数据库，对您的用户产生最小的影响？ Atlassian每个租户客户分配一个Postgres数据库，其中一些[…]
